description: A comprehensive pipeline for automated detection, segmentation, and classification of arthropod specimens from composite images. This software implements the methods described in 'Integrated arthropod monitoring pipeline detects size-dependent responses' (manuscript in review, 2025).
references: Meyer, P., Scharnhorst, V., Lechner, M., Haslinger, H., Gierus, M., & Meimberg, H. (2025). Integrated arthropod monitoring pipeline detects size-dependent responses. Manuscript in review.
